ea14a441-88b7-4ba2-87e6-a8915802840a.description: This is a badge that measures success through the successful completion of three Pathway Checks (i.e., online quizzes) in the three sections of the Pathways to Success Community at Bellevue University. e9ccaeae-58b3-4f2e-b75f-27d8fda7e5c0.name: Professional Retail Sales & Management (PRSM)

da3acf8e-1491-4043-8380-c1cb330a52c0.description: Student has demonstrated mastery of critical operational aspects of banking knowledge, including the fundamentals of banking, defining and executing excellence through teams and for the client, improving bank success, and financial analysis.
da3acf8e-1491-4043-8380-c1cb330a52c0.name: Professional Banking Operations & Leadership (PBOL)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge must have completed coursework designed exclusively for Sun Trust's banking context.

e34731cc-c68d-4dbd-9643-5a67b957a477.description: Student has demonstrated mastery of the foundational knowledge and skills needed to succeed in today’s dynamic retail environment. e34731cc-c68d-4dbd-9643-5a67b957a477.name: Professional Retail Management (PRM)

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, students must have completed coursework designed exclusively for Home Depot's retail operations.

72288f9a-a785-4d16-8831-09bbb60dcf5a.description: Earners of the Facebook Digital Marketing Certificate have gained foundational skills necessary for marketing roles across a range of companies. These skills include content marketing, branding, analytics, social media, search and display advertising, and email marketing. They are able to develop digital marketing plans, create content strategy briefs, and analyze a target audience using Google Analytics. They can develop campaigns using Facebook Ads, Search and Display Ads, and email marketing.
72288f9a-a785-4d16-8831-09bbb60dcf5a.name: The Facebook Digital Marketing Certificate from Bellevue University

alignments.name: This certificate program is aligned with the Facebook Certified Digital Marketing Associate exam.
alignments.description: Associate level exam covering foundational advertising concepts on Facebook, Instagram and Messenger.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 6-course certificate program in digital marketing co-developed by Facebook and Pathstream
Complete a curriculum of project-based assessments that demonstrate proficiency in digital marketing
